name: Wisp of Hope
text_description: The Wisp of Hope, although weak in attacks, has the power to restore health to allies. When this card is in play, it heals 10HP to one random Spirit type card each turn.
illustration_description: A small, glowing, wispy entity floating over a serene, moonlit pond. Glints of healing aura wrap around the wisp, and its soft light reflects gently off the water.
